div.div: DISRUPTION

div.a: Will Hulu's Revolution Kill Its Creator?

div.div: Jason Kilar’s vision for Hulu transformed web video. So why is Hulu in trouble and Kilar rumored to be on his way out? Because his vision transformed web video.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ta9C4H&via=Digg&text=Will Hulu's Revolution Kill Its Creator?

div.div: HOW DID HE BUILD THESE?

div.a: This 14-Year-Old Kid Is A Lego Genius

div.div: This is Stijn Oom, a 14-year-old kid from the Netherlands. Stijn started to play with Lego right after he was potty trained (literally).Just a short time later, he's a certifiable Lego genius.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QfjSKo&via=Digg&text=This 14-Year-Old Kid Is A Lego Genius

div.div: UGH

div.a: Yes, Michael Vick Owns A Dog

div.div: This whole thing started last week, when Vick tweeted a photo of his daughter doing homework

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TjZsOx&via=Digg&text=Yes, Michael Vick Owns A Dog

div.div: DON'T SAY, 'BRO'

div.a: What Your Email Salutation Says About You

div.div: How you start an email reveals a lot more about your intentions than you know. Common e-greetings for etiquette voodoo.

li.div:
"Hey,": you want something.
What your email salutation says about the content of your message: themorningnews.org/article...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ohKCqr&via=Digg&text=What Your Email Salutation Says About You

div.div: SHOTS FIRED

div.a: Reddit Blocks Gawker In Defence Of Its Right To Be Really, Really Creepy

div.div: Links from Gawker are banned from /r/politics, after journalist threatens to reveal the identity of the man running Reddit's "creepshots", "beatingwomen" and "jailbait" forums.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QTIsSv&via=Digg&text=Reddit Blocks Gawker In Defence Of Its Right To Be Really, Really Creepy

div.div: PITTING FRIEND AGAINST FRIEND

div.a: How The Presidential Election Kills Facebook Friendships

div.div: Nearly one-fifth of people admit to blocking, unfriending or hiding someone on social media over political postings, according to a recent survey by the Pew Research Center's Internet & American Life Project.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qm1Bdq&via=Digg&text=How The Presidential Election Kills Facebook Friendships

div.div: PLACES TO COLONIZE
Scientists at Yale University have discovered a nearby super-Earth that is a “diamond planet” — a planet that has a mantle made of graphite and diamond.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QZMPdg&via=Digg&text=Scientists Discover 'Diamond Planet'

div.div: EVOLUTION
An extinct arthropod’s fossil reveals that anatomically complex brains evolved earlier than previously thought and have changed little over the course of evolution.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RzMEVr&via=Digg&text=Fossil Preserves World's Oldest Brain

div.div: REASON TO PUT A SPRING IN YOUR STEP

div.a: What Does The Way You Walk Say About You?

div.div: We can often use the smallest piece of information -- like a person's gait -- to create surprisingly accurate impressions.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PWHCAA&via=Digg&text=What Does The Way You Walk Say About You?

div.div: SO WRONG

div.a: This Turtle Pees From Its Mouth

div.div: Soft-shelled turtles from China can essentially expel pee from their mouths.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q0U2aH&via=Digg&text=This Turtle Pees From Its Mouth

div.div: THE CAKE IS STILL A LIE THOUGH

div.a: A Portal Gun That Can Levitate A Companion Cube

div.div: "I tore apart components you can find at your local toy store to make a portal gun that actually levitates a companion cube."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W7Bzi3&via=Digg&text=A Portal Gun That Can Levitate A Companion Cube

div.div: ITS NAME IS JAKE

div.a: Curiosity Rover Finds Rock Type That's Never Been Seen On Mars

div.div: After shooting it with lasers and X-rays, NASA’s Curiosity rover has determined that a rock nicknamed “Jake Matijevic” is of a variety that no other rover has ever spotted on Mars.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rj9q3s&via=Digg&text=Curiosity Rover Finds Rock Type That's Never Been Seen On Mars

div.div: NEW TOURIST TRAPS

div.a: Spot Where Julius Caesar Was Stabbed Discovered

div.div: Archaeologists believe they have found the first physical evidence of the spot where Julius Caesar died, according to a new Spanish National Research Council report.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QlYcuY&via=Digg&text=Spot Where Julius Caesar Was Stabbed Discovered

div.div: THE BIG GUN

div.a: Paul Ryan Lifts Weights, Internet Explodes

div.div: Republican Vice Presidential candidate Paul Ryan sat down for a photo shoot with TIME for a piece on his fitness regime. Needless to say, the pictures are getting more attention than the article itself.

li.div: Has a VP candidate ever worn a sleeveless tee to a debate?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T81hi3&via=Digg&text=Paul Ryan Lifts Weights, Internet Explodes

div.div: PORN PARODIES

div.a: 'Superman Vs. Spider-Man XXX' Is A Pornographic Thing That Is Happening

div.div: There's really not much to say other than to watch the (surprisingly) safe for work trailer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OWCj9I&via=Digg&text='Superman Vs. Spider-Man XXX' Is A Pornographic Thing That Is Happening

div.div: 2012 ELECTION
Vice President Joe Biden and Congressman Paul Ryan face off in the only Vice Presidential Debate.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W8fYWI&via=Digg&text=LIVE: Vice Presidential Debate

div.div: 'RADIOACTIVE COKE CAN'

div.a: A Glossary Of Lance Armstrong's Secret Language

div.div: Armstrong, other cyclists, and doctors used this strange terminology to fool authorities should they come under investigation.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RdADUL&via=Digg&text=A Glossary Of Lance Armstrong's Secret Language

div.div: BEAUTIFUL DATA VISUALIZATIONS

div.a: How Viral Photos Explode On Facebook

div.div: Here's a series of videos that visualize a single piece of content being shared between hundreds of thousands of individuals on Facebook.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TBSBWl&via=Digg&text=How Viral Photos Explode On Facebook

div.div: NO DIMPLED CHADS ON THE WEB
Making internet voting secure is a big challenge, but American elections have bigger demons.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OWfN0K&via=Digg&text=Why Can't You Vote Online?

div.div: DEBUNKED

div.a: No, Duct Tape Will Not Work As A Gag

div.div: We've all seen a gangster silence a hero with a duct tape gag before during a movie. But here's the thing: it doesn't actually work.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OqiQN8&via=Digg&text=No, Duct Tape Will Not Work As A Gag

div.div: DON'T SCRATCH IT

div.a: Apple To Begin Sales Of iPhone 5 Cases

div.div: Cases for the new phone should reach Apple stores before the end of the month, says AppleInsider.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RRhrz7&via=Digg&text=Apple To Begin Sales Of iPhone 5 Cases

div.div: TAKE THE BLUE PILL

div.a: Are We Living In The Matrix?

div.div: A group of physicists thinks they’ve figured out a way to uncover whether we’re living in the Matrix. Seriously.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/STtbnq&via=Digg&text=Are We Living In The Matrix?

div.div: TECHIE-IN-CHIEF

div.a: Obama, Romney Write Letters To New York Tech Community

div.div: A few weeks ago, the organizers of the New York Tech Meetup sent letters to both candidates asking how them to explain how their policies would benefit the community. Now, both candidates have answered.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SOKiXe&via=Digg&text=Obama, Romney Write Letters To New York Tech Community

div.div: MEDIEVAL DISEASES
California health officials say they've trapped a squirrel that's tested positive for bubonic plague, an infectious disease that can spread to humans through the bites of infected fleas.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Pnt8iy&via=Digg&text=Bubonic Plague Found In Squirrel
